availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Platte County, Missouri, and Hopkins County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Missouri native. Son of Palson Harrig and Mary A. Harrig. Resident of Weston, Missouri, in 1850. Shoemaker in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, Platte County, Weston, p. 288A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1863, p. 10.
"Casper Harrig (1842-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #111595216, accessed November 30, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/111595216.
